Hevy Kevy's Hotwings and Grill

Hevy Kevy's hotwings are the best around with an award winning recipe. They come in a variety of heat levels ranging from Safe to the highly challening Ring of Fire. For those not interested in spicy wings we also offer honey BBQ wings, smoked wings, and a variety of dipping sauces. There are other options available you might find at any diner, as well as beer. Please come and enjoy yourself at Hevy Kevy's Hotwings and Grill!

Stephen Deshon 2022
